title: Amvrosios Papadopoulos
text:
Amvrosios Papadopoulos (, born 10 January 1989) is a professional <a href="Greeks">Greek</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player, currently playing for <a href="Agrotikos%20Asteras%20F.C.">Agrotikos Asteras</a>.
Club career.
He started his professional career with <a href="Skoda%20Xanthi%20F.C.">Skoda Xanthi</a> in 2007. In January 2010, he moved to <a href="Beta%20Ethniki">Beta Ethniki</a> side Thrasyvoulos on loan, but left after 4 months on 23 April 2010. He subsequently joined <a href="Makedonikos%20F.C.">Makedonikos</a>, <a href="Kozani%20F.C.">Kozani</a> and <a href="Delta%20Ethniki">Delta Ethniki</a> side Orfeas Eleftheroupoli. He moved to current club Doxa Drama on 16 January 2012, where he scored on his debut.
International career.
Amvrosios was a former <a href="Greece%20national%20under-17%20football%20team">Greece U-17</a> international. He made his debut in a <a href="2006%20UEFA%20European%20Under-17%20Football%20Championship">UEFA European U-17 Championship</a> qualifier against <a href="Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina%20national%20under-17%20football%20team">Bosnia & Herzegovina</a>.
